resources.string: You already have set up a token.
The request has not been applied because it lacks valid authentication credentials for the target resource.\n Please make sure the token is set correctly.
The server understood the request but refuses to authorize it. Please make sure the token is set correctly.
\n1. Press the "Get token" button at the bottom of the widget setting screen.\n

\n2. Log in to the page opened in the browser, issue the access token by pressing the "+ Generate access token" button at the bottom of the page. Since the displayed token will not be displayed again please make a note. \n
\n3. Return to the widget setting screen and press the "Set token" button.\n
\n4. Enter the token you obtained earlier in the text box.\n
\n5. Press the "OK" button to set the token.\n

Caution
 If you optimize the battery of the smartphone or set power saving, the application may not work properly. In such a case, please set this widget as an exclusion application of power saving function.
